artefact: Laser or intense pulsed light treatment registration (England and Wales)

artefact.overview: You need to register to offer treatments that use intense pulsed light systems or lasers in England and Wales
artefact.licence_short_description: Register to offer treatments that use intense pulsed light systems or lasers in England and Wales.
artefact.licence_overview:
To offer treatments involving intense pulsed light systems or lasers, you must register with the [Care Quality Commission (CQC)](http://www.cqc.org.uk/ "Care Quality Commission (CQC)"){:rel="external"} in England or the [Healthcare Inspectorate Wales](http://www.hiw.org.uk/ "Healthcare Inspectorate Wales"){:rel="external"} in Wales.

Physiotherapists using Class 3b lasers are exempt.

In some areas you may also need to obtain a licence from the local authority.

*[CQC]: Care Quality Commission
